overview:
Kevin is a Principal with Atlanta Payments Group, a small group of Senior Executives from the Payments and Financial Technology Industries seeking investment and/or executive management roles with early-stage and growth oriented companies.

Kevin most recently was the CEO of Skylight Financial, a prepaid debit card company that was acquired by Netspend in 2008. His prior roles have included President of a publicly traded financial services provider, COO of internet banking and online bill payment company, General Manager of an e-Payments division, and management consultant with Accenture.

He serves as an advisor and board member to various technology oriented companies and is actively involved in the Technolgy Association of Georgia (TAG) FinTech Steering Committee.
